Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone
Reviews.Author: Joshua Plunkett
Reviews.Content: There were minor scratches and marks on the phone, which was a little upsetting, but other than that it's great!

Reviews.Title: apple i phone 4 8GB
Reviews.Author: mrs.cooke
Reviews.Content: I was satisfied about the shipment but I was not happy that the I phone I had bought from bargins and more was locked and notify that the I phone was lost or stolen and sprint couldn't activated for me! So I return it to get my money back

Reviews.Title: I use it as my ipad/comp on the go
Reviews.Author: Liisa Bjork
Reviews.Content: I did not get service for this phone . I use it as my ipod, ipad, camera.... for on the go. All I need is wifi and I am on the net for free! Cant beat paying $222.00 for all this. Like new without any dents or scratches. Got it as used. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: My Sprint IPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Shareena
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my iPhone it's really fast when I google things they come right up I iMessage my family and friends I absolutely love this phone I would highly recommend people to buy from this supplier. :-)

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Mijail vivas
Reviews.Content: excellent product, very happy with the service and especially the speed, very grateful. keep great confidence in this procurement mechanism

Reviews.Title: este telefono es desbloqueado
Reviews.Author: ivonne
Reviews.Content: Good evening, I'm from Venezuela and I'm interested in buying this phone but I need to know if it is unlocked for use outside the U.S.
